# Pull Request Template

## Description
This PR adds updates to the project documentation and fixes minor bugs in the codebase. It also ensures that the README includes all group member details and assignment instructions.

## Type of Change
- Bug fix
- New feature
- Documentation update
- Other

## Checklist
- My code follows the guidelines of this project
- I have tested my changes
- I have added necessary comments
- README and other documentation updated if needed

## Related Issue
This PR addresses Issue #3 – updating the README file and integrating group members’ contributions.
